Trustee_4_pre_2.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_2.content: My reputation as a trustee has been reinforced through my commitment to transparency and adherence to the agreed allocation plan. I ensured that the investor received their fair share of 60% of the profits, demonstrating my trustworthiness and pro-social behavior. I believe this positive experience will promote my integrity and foster future collaborative opportunities.
